# archestra_prompt (Data Source)

Fetches an existing Archestra prompt by ID or name. This data source is useful for looking up prompt details needed to create trusted data policies and tool invocation policies.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Fetch prompt by ID
data "archestra_prompt" "example_by_id" {
  id         = "prompt-id-here"
}

# Fetch prompt by name
data "archestra_prompt" "example_by_name" {
  name       = "my-prompt"
}

output "prompt_id" {
  value       = data.archestra_prompt.example_by_id.id
  description = "The prompt ID"
}

output "system_prompt" {
  value = data.archestra_prompt.example_by_id.system_prompt
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Prompt identifier
- `name` (String) The name of the prompt

### Read-Only

- `is_active` (Boolean) Whether the prompt is active
- `prompt` (String) The main prompt content
- `system_prompt` (String) System prompt content
- `version` (Number) Version of the prompt
